name: Luxury Jetsetter
tagline: First-class treatment, Park Hyatt robes, 3+ cents per point redemptions
description: You don’t just travel — you arrive. Park Hyatt Paris / St. Regis Maldives / Alila Ventana on points, private transfers, trip delay that actually pays out. You run the absolute minimum number of cards while still getting elite-level perks and 3–8 cpp redemptions.

slots.name: The Hub (pick 1–2)
slots.description: Transfer partners + boosted portal + god-tier insurance & lounges

slots.name: Multiplier Engine
slots.description: 3–5x → transferable points on everyday & business spend

slots.name: Everyday and Grocery Booster
slots.description: Reliable cash back or points on daily essentials like groceries and dining

slots.name: Rent & Dining Booster
slots.description: Turn biggest fixed expense into transferable points + 3x dining / 2x travel

slots.name: Hotel Status Closer (optional but god-tier)
slots.description: Free nights every year + status + bonus points on paid stays

rules.title: Venture X + Reserve is the current 2025 meta
rules.description: Capital One lounges + Priority Pass + Plaza Premium + 10k anniversary miles + $300 easy credit beats Reserve alone for most people.

rules.title: No Redemption Under 2.5 cpp
rules.description: Portal at 1.5–1.77x is for emergencies only.

rules.title: Hyatt Card + Chase points = stupid value
rules.description: Cat 1–4 free night + up to 9x on paid stays + Discoverist (or Globalist with challenge) is basically printing money.

name: Wallet Freak
tagline: The Final Boss — Issuers Fear You
description: You run every premium card, hit every credit, script every retention offer, and have a spreadsheet that would make NASA blush. You are the endgame.

slots.name: Premium Hub Collection (you run all of them)
slots.description: Every lounge, every credit, every transfer partner — you abuse them all.

slots.name: Food Warlord
slots.description: Maximum points/calorie ratio

slots.name: Everyday Catch-All
slots.description: Flat-rate rewards for non-category spend

slots.name: Pure Feeder Layer
slots.description: Uncapped 2x+ transferable everywhere else (including rent)

rules.title: Every Credit Is Mandatory
rules.description: Miss one $10 credit and you owe the group chat $100.

rules.title: Biz Platinum Is The 2025 MVP
rules.description: $400 Dell, $360 Indeed, $120 wireless, $189 CLEAR, $155 Walmart+ — all easily used = $1,200+ value before points.

rules.title: Retention Season = Christmas
rules.description: Every January you collect 200k+ points in retention offers.

name: Points Strategist
tagline: Transfer Partner Only — 5+ cpp or bust
description: You live for ANA First, Virgin Upper Class, Flying Blue Promo Rewards, Hyatt Globalist on points. Portal redemptions are for peasants.

slots.name: Primary Transfer Hub(s)
slots.description: Best partners + highest multipliers

slots.name: Secondary/Booster Hubs
slots.description: Extra points or specific sweet spots

slots.name: Everyday and Grocery Essentials
slots.description: Boosted rewards on daily purchases to feed into transfers

slots.name: 2x+ Uncapped Feeder
slots.description: Everything non-bonus goes here → transfer for 4–10 cpp

rules.title: Portal Is For Mortals
rules.description: Minimum 3 cpp on every redemption. 5+ is normal.

rules.title: Ink Preferred Is Secretly The Best Hub in 2025
rules.description: 3x on ads/shipping/travel/phone (up to $150k) + full Chase partners = monster for anyone with business spend.

name: Business Powerhouse
tagline: 5x ads, 5x office, 4x software, 3x shipping — pure profit
description: You run 7-figure ad spend or heavy software/SaaS bills. Points pay for the company retreat in Maldives business class.

slots.name: Category Destroyer
slots.description: 4–5x on ads, software, shipping, office supplies, telecom

slots.name: Large Purchase & Uncapped
slots.description: 2–2.5x on everything else, no limits

slots.name: Everyday Personal Booster
slots.description: For non-business spend like groceries and dining

slots.name: Premium Travel & Credits Closer
slots.description: Lounge access, transfer partners, Dell/Indeed/wireless credits

rules.title: Current Routing Bible (2025)
rules.description: Meta/Google/TikTok/LinkedIn → Biz Gold 4x (up to $150k) │ Shipping/office/telecom → Ink Preferred 3x or Ink Cash 5x │ SaaS/cloud → Biz Gold/Biz Plat 4x/1.5x │ Large purchases → Ink Premier 2.5x or Biz Plat 1.5x

rules.title: Employee Cards = Free First Class
rules.description: Every team member gets a card. Their Uber Eats = your lie-flat seat.

name: Cashback Pragmatist
tagline: Points Are Cope. Cash Is King.
description: You looked at the points circus, laughed, and took real money instead. Zero games, maximum sleep, still 2–5% everywhere.

slots.name: True 2%+ Core
slots.description: Flat rate, no thinking, no caps (or refundable fee)

slots.name: 5% High-Yield Spice
slots.description: Extra work for massive boosts in your real categories

slots.name: Grocery and Dining Enhancer
slots.description: Boosted cash back on food-related spend

rules.title: No Net Annual Fee Ever
rules.description: Spark Cash Plus & Ink Premier only if you spend enough to offset/refund.

rules.title: Cash Back → Index Funds Monthly
rules.description: Points players seethe while your net worth grows.

name: Foodie & Grocery King
description: Your monthly food bill is a mortgage payment. Every calorie must return ≥10%.

slots.name: Max Grocery (Capped)
slots.description: 6% on up to $6k/year — you always hit it

slots.name: Unlimited Dining + Overflow Groceries
slots.description: 4x dining worldwide + 4x groceries after cap + massive credits

slots.name: Everyday Catch-All
slots.description: Flat rewards for non-food spend

slots.name: Bonus Category Backup
slots.description: When you want 3–5x on food with different ecosystems

rules.title: $6,000.01 → Switch to Gold Immediately
rules.description: Track obsessively.

rules.title: Gold Credits Are Free Money
rules.description: $120 Uber, $120 dining, $100 Resy, $84 Dunkin — use every dollar or fail.

name: Family Freak
tagline: Groceries for an army, Disney bundle, Costco runs — all maxed
description: Six mouths to feed = massive predictable spend. You turn Costco hauls into family vacations.

slots.name: 2025 Family God Tier
slots.description: 6% groceries, 6% streaming, 3% gas/transit

slots.name: Overflow + Worldwide Dining
slots.description: After BCP caps + international restaurants

slots.name: Everyday and Travel Basics
slots.description: Rewards for general spend and family trips

slots.name: Big Box / Wholesale Maxers
slots.description: Costco, Amazon, Target, Walmart, Sam’s Club — all at 5%

rules.title: BCP First, Always
rules.description: Until every cap is destroyed.

rules.title: Quarterly Wholesale Raids Are Sacred
rules.description: Stock up when wholesale clubs are 5% quarter.

name: Gas/EV Charging Freak
tagline: 5%+ on every gallon/kWh or civil unrest
description: 200+ mile daily commute or Tesla Supercharger bills — you will annihilate fuel costs.

slots.name: Year-Round 5% Lock
slots.description: Permanent 5% on gas/EV

slots.name: Quarterly 5% Nuke
slots.description: When gas is rotating category — go stupid

slots.name: Grocery and Dining Add-On
slots.description: For food stops during commutes

slots.name: Reliable 3–4% Backup
slots.description: When custom/quarterly not available

rules.title: Upside + Shell Pay + Gift Cards + 5% Card = 50¢+ off/gallon
rules.description: Normal behavior.

rules.title: Costco Gas + Citi Costco Card = Religion
rules.description: If you have membership.

name: Online Shopping Addict
tagline: 10–20% back online or I’m not buying
description: Amazon is your corner store. Your mailman knows your dog's name.

slots.name: Amazon/Whole Foods Maxer
slots.description: 5%+ on everything Bezos

slots.name: Quarterly Online & PayPal Nuke
slots.description: 5% on PayPal, online shopping, wholesale clubs

slots.name: Everyday Essentials
slots.description: Flat rewards for offline or non-online spend

slots.name: Portal + Shopping Offers Stack
slots.description: Rakuten/TopCashback + portal + card

rules.title: Rakuten/TopCashback Is Mandatory
rules.description: 10–15% stack is normal, 30%+ on good days.

rules.title: PayPal Key Dead → PayPal Quarterly Is Still King
rules.description: Route everything possible through PayPal when 5%.

name: Simple Minimalist
tagline: One or Two Cards. Zero Drama. Maximum Peace.
description: You make bank, hate complexity, just want the absolute highest return with zero effort.

slots.name: True One-Card Setups
slots.description: Best single-card returns in 2025

slots.name: Two-Card Max Peace Combo
slots.description: If you want slightly higher return for almost no work

slots.name: Optional Grocery Add-On
slots.description: For minimal effort boost on food spend

rules.title: Venture X Is The Current Winner
rules.description: $300 credit + 10k miles + lounges + 2x everything = effectively ~3%+ on all spend after perks.

name: Yuppie Flexer
tagline: Heavy metal, Centurion access, bottle service energy
description: Young professional in NYC/SF/Miami. You want the heaviest cards, best lounges, and to flex without looking like you’re trying.

slots.name: Status Symbol Core
slots.description: Metal weight ranking: Biz Plat > Plat > Reserve > Gold

slots.name: Lifestyle & Food Flex
slots.description: Credits that fund your actual life

slots.name: Everyday Multiplier
slots.description: Reliable rewards for daily urban spend

slots.name: Catch-All Multiplier
slots.description: Quietly earns 2x on everything else

rules.title: Biz Plat Is The Flex King 2025
rules.description: Matte black metal + Dell/Indeed credits you actually use + 35% points back on flights = peak yuppie.

rules.title: Every Lifestyle Credit Or You’re Mid
rules.description: Saks, Equinox, CLEAR, Resy, Uber, airline — all of them.

name: Value Traveler
tagline: Premium perks, net-negative annual fee, minimal effort
description: You travel 10–20x/year but refuse to pay net fees. Lounges, good insurance, easy credits only.

slots.name: Core Premium Card (pick 1)
slots.description: Fully offset fee + lounges + solid redemptions

slots.name: Everyday Earner
slots.description: High return on daily spend + rent if applicable

slots.name: Grocery and Dining Support
slots.description: Boost for home-based spend between trips

rules.title: Venture X Is Still #1 Value in 2025
rules.description: $300 portal credit + 10k anniversary + Capital One lounges + Priority Pass = free money.

rules.title: Only Keep If Net Positive
rules.description: Track every credit — if you're not up $500+, downgrade.

name: Category Hunter
description: Quarterly activation day is a holiday. You manufacture spend like it’s your job.

slots.name: Rotating Category GOATs
slots.description: Chase & Discover 5% quarters

slots.name: Custom Category Locks
slots.description: Permanent 5% in your top category

slots.name: Everyday Flat Rate
slots.description: Backup for non-category months

slots.name: Rent & Fixed Bonus
slots.description: Bilt fills the gaps with 3x dining / 2x travel / 1x rent

rules.title: Activate At 12:01am EST
rules.description: Or you're soft.

rules.title: Max Every Cap Every Quarter
rules.description: Visa gift cards, charity, whatever it takes.

name: Student Starter
tagline: Build 800+ credit while eating out & Ubering
description: College/recent grad, thin file, high food/Uber/streaming spend. Easy approval, no AF, solid rewards.

slots.name: Student Daily Driver
slots.description: Best current student cards + Bilt if you have rent

slots.name: Everyday and Secured Options
slots.description: Build credit with flat rewards or secured cards

rules.title: Pay In Full Every Month
rules.description: 800+ score by graduation guaranteed.

rules.title: Graduate → Immediate Upgrade Path
rules.description: Discover It → regular It, SavorOne Student → regular SavorOne, etc.

name: Hotel Status Chaser
description: You want hotel elite status for the perks + free nights every year + high earn on paid stays.

slots.name: Hyatt (Best Value Status)
slots.description: Discoverist + Cat 1–4 free night + extra free night after $15k spend

slots.name: Hilton (Easiest Diamond)
slots.description: Instant Diamond + resort credit + free weekend night

slots.name: Marriott (Highest Status)
slots.description: Instant Platinum + $300 dining credit + 85k free night

slots.name: Everyday Rewards Pairing
slots.description: General spend cards to complement hotel perks

slots.name: Budget Hotel Status
slots.description: Cheaper cards with solid free nights & status

rules.title: Aspire Card Is Still The Hotel GOAT in 2025
rules.description: Diamond + $250 resort + $250 airline + free night = $2k+ value easy.

rules.title: Always Pair With Transfer Hub
rules.description: Chase → Hyatt/IHG/Marriott, Amex → Hilton/Marriott.

name: Airline Companion Pass Chaser
tagline: Companion flies free, free bags, lounge access
description: Loyal to one airline, want all the family/friend perks.

slots.name: Southwest (Companion Pass Path)
slots.description: 7,500 anniversary points + upgraded boardings + $75 credit

slots.name: Delta (Best Companion Cert)
slots.description: Annual companion certificate + Resy/rideshare credits

slots.name: United (Free Bags + Club Passes)
slots.description: Free bags + club passes + $125 credit (Quest)

slots.name: Everyday and Grocery Support
slots.description: Rewards for non-travel spend to build points

rules.title: Use The Companion Cert Every Year
rules.description: That's $500–$1,500 value alone.

rules.title: Put All Flights On The Card
rules.description: Even if lower earn — perks are worth it.
